attributes.action: Do not make a deal with USA and Trump, stand up for human rights
attributes.additional_details: Labour is rolling back human rights laws to get a deal with Trump and the USA. Don't do it. Work with Europe and Canada. Drop trump and make a stand.
attributes.background: Do not roll back human rights to get a deal with USA and Trump. Align with Europe and Canada.

rejection.details:
Dear Connor,

Thank you for your petition.

We are unable to accept your petition as we're not exactly sure what UK human rights legislation you are referring to, and what you mean when you talk about rolling back human rights. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do in relation to the UK-US trade deal.

Kind regards,

The Petitions Team
